divs: Sighting DetailsWitness Statement: From report form #1 I was in my backyard with my 3 kids sitting on our trampoline watching a movie (husband had set up a screen and projector). My two older kids and I saw a bright green light that seemed to be over my neighbors backyard. It moved quickly from my right to left & then disappeared
Summary: Neon Green Orb over neighbors house
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There were no other sightings in Stephenville on or around December 29th 2007
